About this site

### U-Know-Uno
Built an online Uno card game solver that gives the most probabilistically optimal move on each turn

Link to repository [U-Know-Uno](https://github.com/bgwarren1/U-know-Uno)



### Big 10 Transition Analysis
Performed predictive analysis on the 4 football teams (UCLA, USC, Oregon, Washington) that were migrating to the Big 10, and predicted the success based on weather, travel, and performance data

Link to repository [Big 10 Transition Analysis](https://github.com/bgwarren1/bsa-big10-predictive-analysis)
